item.title: Zakra App V2 - Testimonials Section
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials

We're as good as they say we are

item.content:encoded: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.
